item.title: Copy/clone/duplicate a mysql database script
item.description: This is a simple script that duplicates your entire database. There are many ways in which you can take advantage of having an exact replica of your production database. In short, the behaviour of the script is the following (in this order, all piped): Delete the COPY database if possible to start with a fresh one Create the COPY database Dump the PRODUCTION database Inject the output of the dump into the COPY database Any errors during the process will be logged to the file defined as $ERROR.
